content: ME: <seeing my wife at kitchen sink doing dish stuff> “Whatcha doin’?” WIFE: “Just getting some stuff by hand.” <most of our stuff goes in the dishwasher> “Won’t take a minute.” ME: <looking at sink> “I did those.” WIFE: <smiles at me> “Uh-huh.” <continues like nothing happened> I also don’t houseclean correctly…
